item.title: The Communication between R and Python: A Story of True Love
item.description: Have you ever been curious about how R and python are able to communicate with each other, well me too. Letâ€™s try to explain their communication process, we can say that R and python are two different people and these two different are named Anna and Hans. Yes, these are the characters from the movie Frozen and yes this is corny, but there is a reason for this wacky explanation.
